application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description: T1	Silver Birch (Betula pendula)	Crown Reduction - Reducing the height and spread of the tree by up to 3m. Final height 7m and spread 4mT2	Lawson Cypress (Chamaecyparis lawsoniana)	Crown Reduction - Reducing the height and spread of the tree by up to 3m, to inline with hand rail of 3rd floor balcony. Final height 10m and spread 3m. T3	Lawson Cypress (Chamaecyparis lawsoniana)	Crown Reduction - Reducing the height and spread of the tree by up to 3m, to inline with hand rail of 3rd floor balcony. Final height 10m and spread 4m. T4-8	Common Lime (Tilia x europaea)	Crown Reduction on client side only- Reducing the height and spread of the tree by up to 2m. Final height up to 8-12m (unchanged) and spread 1-4m
decision_conditions: Works agreed to tree labelled T1
Works agreed to tree labelled T2
